lines:
19JZ

17 March, 1919.

Mr. Bung Sing Kran

536 Commonwealth Ave.

Boston, Mass.

My doar kwan:

I have your letter of March 16th enclosing the list of guests

to be invited to the coming tea.

Cards will be sent out very shortly.

The change of date is all right, too.

The two you havo mentioned for the automobile transfer seems 
to me altog et hor too high. If you do not find something much more reason -
able let me know, and I vill see if anything can be done to beto ar advantage

at this end.

on the invitations that are sent out I will follow your sugges -
tion and ask that rapiš 9 be sent. This is a couuon practicesand is done 
in order that those who plan to entertain may mow how many guests to pro -
vide for. In this way we ought to be able to toll in advance how many and 
Just who are to be present.

I will take up with Miss Clemong your suggation about asking the 
guests to meet lips. Hall. It seems to me to be an o11ct idea. 
Come to see me Sunday if you possibly can.

Faithfully yours,
raw: 19JZ 17 March, 1919. Mr. Bung Sing Kran 536 Commonwealth Ave. Boston, Mass. My doar kwan: I have your letter of March 16th enclosing the list of guests to be invited to the coming tea. Cards will be sent out very shortly. The change of date is all right, too. The two you havo mentioned for the automobile transfer seems to me altog et hor too high. If you do not find something much more reasonable let me know, and I vill see if anything can be done to beto ar advantage at this end. on the invitations that are sent out I will follow your suggestion and ask that rapiš 9 be sent. This is a couuon practicesand is done in order that those who plan to entertain may mow how many guests to provide for. In this way we ought to be able to toll in advance how many and Just who are to be present. I will take up with Miss Clemong your suggation about asking the guests to meet lips. Hall. It seems to me to be an o11ct idea. Come to see me Sunday if you possibly can. Faithfully yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter with list of guests for upcoming tea, confirming change of date, requesting a lower price for the automobile transfer, and offering to ask Miss Clemons if the guests might meet Mrs. Hall.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
